Row.Text: A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with an [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Avenue, and the specific Jacobin received is random. Each Jacobin can only be received once. Cost increases per Jacobin trained.
Activate on the Palace to increase all Support effects from [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Actions by 10%.
Activate on the Palace to grant all Land Units +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength in Districts.
Activate on the Palace to grant all Units +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Activate on the Palace or a City Hall to add +10[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness to the Building.
Activate on the Palace to immediately trigger a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
Activate on any City's District to add +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in that City.
Activate on the Palace to add +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters.
Activate on the Palace to add +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters.
Activate on the Palace to unlock a unique Tradition, Reign of Terror; +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters, but -25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in Cities.
Activate on an Army Commander to change its name to “Archangel of the Terror.” Units within this Command Radius gain +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Zócalo, and the specific Revolucionario received is random. Each Revolucionario can only be received once. Cost increases per Revolucionario trained.
Activate on a Zócalo to grant 2 free Soldaderas with +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
+3 Combat Strength from Amelio Robles Ávila
Activate on the Palace to immediately trigger a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
Activate on an Army Commander. All Soldaderas Units within the Command Radius gain +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Activate on a Town's District to summon a free Infantry Unit on every land [icon:CITY_URBAN] District in that Town.
Activate on an Army Commander to grant +10[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Commander Level it has.
Activate on a Zócalo to grant +1 [icon:NAR_REW_TRADITION_SLOT] Social Policy slot.
Activate on an Army Commander to [icon:Action_Heal] Heal all Units in the Command Radius to full.
Activate on an Army Commander to grant it enough experience for 5 [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Levels.
Activate on an Army Commander. When a Unit within this Commander’s Command Radius defeats an enemy Unit, gain[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of its Combat Strength.
Activate on a City Center to grant +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to all Farms in the Settlement.

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities when you are Suzerain of a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State, and the specific Uparat received is random. Each Uparat can only be received once. Cost increases per Uparat trained.
Activate on Palace to immediately receive 100[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence.
Activate on a District to immediately trigger a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Activate on an City-State you are Suzerain of to turn it into a [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town under your control.
Activate on Tropical Terrain to grant 2 Chang Beun with +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Activate on a Commander to grant Units in the Command Radius +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Activate on an Independent Power. This Independent Power becomes a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State with you as Suzerain.
Activate on another Leader's Capital to establish a World Bank Office. Costs [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence, cost scales with Relationship.
